task.title: View Additional Security Information for Guest Users
task.shortdesc: View or change user security information for guest users on the User Summary page.

ul.li: Guest name and user account name
Default password, last logon date, and last logon time
User details (for example, e-mail, phone number, extension)
Component companies the user has been granted access

note.p: The View Password link in the Default Password field is now a securable object. System administrators viewing the User Security > User Summary page must have the View permission assigned to the View Default Password object to be able to select the View Password link and see the default password value for any employee or guest user (Menu > System Configuration > Role Administration > select a role > Web Access Rights > Security > User Administration > View Default Password). Without permissions to the Default Password object, the View Password link does not display.

step.cmd: Search for a user by using the Find By field. Search results appear.
Select the link in the Full Name column. The User Security > User Summary page appears.
Select Edit. The User Summary page appears with editable fields.
Enter updated information for the user.
Select Save. The User Summary page appears.
